products.title: Topchic Permanent Hair Color
products.description:
DISCOVER A HOLISTIC COLOR SYSTEM. Sixty patents and more than forty years of continual innovation have made Topchic Permanent Hair Color one of the best professional brands in the world.
  • 100% Grey Coverage
  • Ultimate Durability
  • Excellent Evenness
  • Optimum Gentleness

products.title: Topchic Developer Lotion
products.description: Intelligent Hair Color Great consistency for ideal spreadability and perfect adherence of the color to the hair. With IntraLipid for ideal combability and smoothness. Available in 3% (10vol.), 6% (20vol.), 9% (30vol.) and 12% (40vol.).

products.title: Nectaya Hair Color
products.description:
Color with Care COLOR RESULTS WITHOUT COMPROMISE.
  • Nurturing hair color – without ammonia-odor
  • Notably healthier hair feeling
  • Rich saturated color
  • Guaranteed grey coverage – up to 100%

products.title: Nectaya Developer Lotion
products.description: Color with Care The creamy consistency is easy to apply and pleasant to work with. Rich formula available in 3% (10vol.), 6% (20vol.), 9% (30vol.) and 12% (40vol.) to meet all color needs.

products.title: Elumen Hair Color
products.description:
Elumenate the Hair ACHIEVE INTENSIVE, PEERLESS RESULTS WITHOUT OXIDATION.
  • Intense and brilliant colors with exceptional shine
  • Remarkable and incredible durability
  • Amazing, healthy looking hair
  • Without oxidation and without ammonia

products.title: Elumen Hair Color Support
products.description:
ELUMEN PREPARE: Pre-Treatment for extremely damaged or highlifted/highlighted hair. It instantly equalizes structural differences and optimizes color deposit on hair for an even & long lasting color result.Elumen Return: Hair color reducer used immediately after coloration with Elumen or in future to reduce unwanted depth, vibrancy or tone. Price: $8.15

ELUMEN CLEAN: For the gentle and thorough removal of skin staining caused by Elumen hair color. Price: $11.50

ELUMEN LOCK: Reduces fading of Elumen hair color and increases durability. Remaining color pigments are deeply drawn into the hair. Removes excess color pigments from the surface of the hair. Price: $11.50

ELUMEN THICKENER: Add the Elumen Thickener to any Elumen formula to create the perfect viscosity for your service. Don’t worry about bleeding even when placing contrasting tones next to each other. Price: $24.50

products.title: Colorance Demi-Permanent Color
products.description:
DISCOVER MORE SHINY COLOR RESULTS.
  • Brilliant shine
  • Smooth hair feel
  • Outstanding gentleness
  • Without ammonia odor

products.title: Colorance Developer Lotion
products.description:
COLORANCE LOTION: Especially designed to work with Colorance – perfectly suited for use with applicator bottle.
COVER PLUS LOTION: Especially designed to work with Colorance Cover Plus – perfectly suited for use with bowl and brush.
EXPRESS TONING LOTION: Especially designed to work with Colorance Express Toning – perfectly suited for use with applicator bottle.

products.title: Elumen Play Hair Color
products.description: Create using vivid and pastel shades - on their own or custom mix and match! Fades on tone and can be removed easily.

products.title: Men ReShade Semi-Permanent Color
products.description:
MEN RESHADE HAIR COLOR - For consistently natural, transparent grey reduction without helmet effect, no visible regrowth. Hybrid Foam Technology works in only 5 minutes. Tone Guard Technology for consistently natural and masculine color. Price: $19.25

MEN RESHADE DEVELOPER AND APPLICATOR: Special developer lotion for guaranteed application time of 5 minutes. Color components are mixed in the special Men ReShade applicator bottle and applied as foam consistency. Price: $18.50

products.title: SilkLift High Performance Lightener
products.description:
High Performance Lighteners with even, clearer results thanks to Anti-Yellow System and protection with the proven ShieldTechnology. 'Strong' for strong lifting of up to 7 levels. Price: $30.50

GENTLE (without ammonia/without ammonia odor) for gentle lifting of up to 5 levels. Price: $30.50

SILKLIFT INTENSIVE CONDITIONING CONCENTRATE: With double conditioning effect. Additional care for stressed hair – with SilkproteinComplex and IntraLipid. Optimal handling and measuring. To upgrade the premium service, add the serum to the premixed working mass in front of your clients. Price: $39.95

products.title: SilkLift Control Lightener
products.description:
CONTROL BEIGE LEVEL 6-8: Predictable, clean, neutral blonde – even on pre-colored hair and darker bases such as level 6-8. Create perfect lift while counteracting the warmth. Up to 7 levels of lift plus controlling pigments. With the familiar SilkLift gentleness. Price: $36.99

CONTROL ASH LEVEL 5-7: Predictable, clean, neutral blonde – even on pre-colored hair and darker bases such as level 5-7. Create perfect lift while counteracting the warmth. Up to 7 levels of lift plus controlling pigments. With the familiar SilkLift gentleness. Price: $36.99

CONTROL ESSENTIAL TONE STABILIZER: Ensures that color pigments remain stable during and after the lightening process. Use is mandatory. Price: $8.50

products.title: SilkLift Developer Lotion
products.description: With SilkproteinComplex and IntraLipid for conditioning during the lightening process. Even results thanks to ultra-creamy consistency.  Available in 3% (10vol.), 6% (20vol.) and 9% (30vol.).

products.title: Oxycur Platin Dustfree Lightener
products.description: Meets all bleaching service demands ranging from subtle highlights to extreme lift. For powerful and gentle results. Pleasant and easy to work with – mixes easily into a creamy consistency. Dust-free blue powder bleach for lifting the hair up to 7 levels.  Price: $500g - $20.95  /  1000g - $32.50

products.title: New Blonde
products.description:
5-minute service to make your highlights service unique and delight your clients. New Blonde only lightens the darker natural hair just enough to break up harsh contrasts.

NEW BLONDE BASE LIFTING CREAM: Interactive dyestuff combination for the self-regulating neutralization of warm pigments. Neutral results without brassiness – with just one product. For every base level (Natural base levels 5–9). Price $10.75

NEW BLONDE LOTION: The matching lotion acts as an accelerator to ensure fast and even distribution. For guaranteed harmonization of contrast in only 5 minutes. Price: $8.25

products.title: System Support Products
products.description:
SYSTEM COLOR REMOVER SKIN: For the effective, yet gentle removal of skin staining. Ready-to-use, mild lotion. Dermatologically tested. Price: $7.75

BONDPRO+: SUPERIOR RELIABILITY - NO VISIBLE DILUTION - EASY 2-STEP APPLICATION - NO ADDITIONAL PROCESSING TIMEPROTECTION SERUM: Penetrates the hair fiber and protects it from within during alkaline bleaching, coloring and texturizing processes. Strengthens hair and prevents breakage. Price: $80.00

NOURISHING FORTIFIER: A rich, intensive treatment that reinforces the bonds within the hair. Each hair fiber is strengthened and deeply nourished. Price: $45.00

@PURE PIGMENTS: high definition direct dye additives that can be customized to create unique color reflections in the hair — like light passing through a prism. Integrate into your oxidative hair color for dimensional pastels, boosted vivids and never-before seen color morphing effects. Price: $29.95

SYSTEM THICKENER: A concentrated Thickening Fluid that empowers you to control and customize the consistency of your color and lightener products. Price: $24.50

SYSTEM EQUALIZER SPRAY: Instantly equalizes structural differences and optimizes the color deposit in the hair structure. Use before any color service (excluding ELUMEN) for more even color results. Price: $12.50

products.title: Soft Color Semi-Permanent Color Foam
products.description: Directly absorbing color foam for brilliant color results in only 5 minutes. For shiny hair – easy to comb. For your salon and your client at home.
